scenario.name: SIP_INVITE_location_PIDF-LO
scenario.send:
INVITE urn:service:sos SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port] From: "NG911 Test" <sip:+12025551212@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: urn:service:sos Call-ID: [call_id] Cseq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:+12025551212@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Call-Info: urn:emergency:uid:callid:123ABCdefg123ABCdefg123ABCdefg12:test.com Call-Info: urn:emergency:uid:incidentid:123ABCdefg123ABCdefg123ABCdefg12:test.com Resource-Priority: esnet.1 Geolocation-Routing: yes Geolocation: <cid:defaultlocation@[local_ip]> Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary=next-content Content-Length: [len]
--next-content Content-Type: application/pidf+xml Content-ID: <defaultlocation@[local_ip]>
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <presence xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:pidf" xmlns:gp="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:pidf:geopriv10" xmlns:bp="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:pidf:geopriv10:basicPolicy" xmlns:ca="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:pidf:geopriv10:civicAddr" entity="sip:SENDER@[local_ip]"> <tuple id="0"> <status> <gp:geopriv> <gp:location-info> <ca:civicAddress> <ca:country>US</ca:country> <ca:A1>MD</ca:A1> <ca:A3>Laurel</ca:A3> <ca:HNO>10</ca:HNO> <ca:RD>TEST</ca:RD> <ca:STS>Ave</ca:STS> <ca:NAM>TEST</ca:NAM> <ca:PC>1234</ca:PC> </ca:civicAddress> </gp:location-info> </gp:geopriv> </status> <timestamp>2026-09-23T12:00:00.03</timestamp> </tuple> </presence>
--next-content Content-Type: application/sdp
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- t=0 0 c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000
